info.name: camelcamelcamel Night Theme
info.description: Night theme for camelcamelcamel.com, an Amazon.com price tracker. Consists mainly of 3 shades of black: #222, #444, and #888. Text is either untouched, colored #ddd or #aaa.
info.additionalInfo:
Could not restyle some outer frames. Removed as much white areas as possible without tampering any images.

Changelog
<u>2016</u>
July 30: Added opacity filter to dull some white backgrounds.
